title: Messaging Functionality Test
description: Test the messaging functionality to ensure that users can send text messages, images, and files to other users and channels. Verify that messages are delivered in real-time and that message history is properly stored and displayed.
preConditions: User has access to at least one channel.
Another test user is available for message exchange.

steps.action: Navigate to a channel and type a text message.
steps.expectedResult: The message input field accepts text input.

steps.action: Send the text message by pressing Enter.
steps.expectedResult: The message appears in the channel and is visible to all users.

steps.action: Upload and send an image file.
steps.expectedResult: The image is uploaded and displayed in the channel.

steps.action: Upload and send a document file.
steps.expectedResult: The document is uploaded and appears as a downloadable attachment.
Message history is preserved and displayed correctly.
